author: jvanzyl
msg: o notes on m1 -> m2 conversion

author: dain
msg: * is vastly simpler due to the extensive use of the Java 5 concurrent APIs
* has a single dependency on backport-util-concurrent
* replaced ObjectName with for service identivation with ServiceName interface
* abstracted service dependencies to ServiceCondition interface
* has pluggable start and stop strategies to handle start and stop errors
* supports services that do not participate in life-cycle
* replaced all logging code with pluggable monitor objects
* has full javadoc and test suite
